EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.09-06-17 CGaylor
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Announcement Regarding Travel at Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly: All, I mentioned at Town Hall that one of our top company priorities is achieving greater autonomy in how we operate, which puts us on a path to becoming a self-sustaining, independent company. As a result, and over the course of the past year, we brought a number of operations formerly administered by Dell/EMC under Pivotal's control—e.g., Pivotal’s benefits and payroll programs. XxXxXx XxXxXx Pivot J Cynthia a question in advance <[[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScSfnc_FNw1mvjqeGpz4Hso8xeWlID9jhG5QjL33XQB29WXXg/viewform?usp=sf_link#start=openform]]>
